org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked

Class AbstractLocalizedRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.AbstractLocalizedRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, LocalizedException
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvalidParameterException, InvalidStateException

    public abstract class AbstractLocalizedRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException
implements LocalizedException
    General localized runtime exception.
    See Also:
